articles.description: Man United scraped past struggling Norwich in the FA Cup and by doing so, they exposed just how much of the "cup magic" was missing without fans.
articles.content: There was no sense of magic in the air -- just the smell of hand sanitiser. Manchester United were made to work devilishly hard to book their place in the FA Cup semifinals, but as they secured a 2-1… [+6989 chars]
